NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Retention and Diversity or the cell corresponding to HR Tech and Leadership?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {HR Tech} and {Leadership} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Compliance and Satisfaction or the cell corresponding to Compensation and Wellbeing?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Compliance} and {Satisfaction} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to HR Tech and Absenteeism or the cell corresponding to Retention and Leadership?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Retention} and {Leadership} has a higher heat value.
